2.1.1.name: wordpress/moolah-e-commerce
2.1.1.description:
Moolah offers an easy-to-use solution for individuals, professionals, and businesses selling premium goods and unique services.

Watch the introduction video at http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tNuLXkhC17I .

Features:

  • Single Page Checkout
  • Responsive and Mobile-Friendly Design
  • Deploy to Several Sites at Once
  • Product Categories, Variations, Attributes
  • Coupons, Promotions, Taxes, Fees, Shipping, and more
  • Templates, Language Codes, Location Information
